name: Under Siege 2
description:
"Under Siege 2" is a 2D top-down arena shooter. Immerse yourself in tank battles and defeat all enemies!

On every new level there will be more and more enemies and they will be more dangerous, so you can’t progress without upgrading your combat vehicle. By crushing enemies you will earn money that you can spend on upgrades your tank. Upgrade your armor to withstand more damage, upgrade your speed to increase maneuverability and dodge enemy projectiles, upgrade your weapons to deal more damage. Pick up bonuses that appear on the map: mines drive your enemies into a trap and they explode; penetrating projectile, breaks through obstacles, as well as through enemy tanks.

Game Feauters:
  • Nice visuals and OST
  • Easy and responsive controls
  • 20 challenging levels
  • Steam Achievements support
  • 4 types of enemy tanks with unique weapons
